sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-container fluid>
    {{ item }}
</v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      item: {},
    };
  },

  methods: {
    getPost(id) {
      this.$axios.get(`/posts/${id}`).then((res) => {
        this.item = res.data;
      });
    },
  },

  mounted() {
    this.getPost(this.$router.params.id)
  }
};
</script>
